channel.title: What are you after in a server?
channel.description:
There is a good amount of people who have asked me to host a server, a good amount of people who are sitting around waiting for a fun PK server to play.
I'm thinking about hosting an advanced easyrsc (more stable than all your RSCD's except RSCA) set up for a PK server. I'm sure i could think of some cool ideas/games to make it fun and worthwhile.
my question is, what would you play a server for? PK? clans? point system? party/group feature? etc
it's also a great place for me to work on all my RSC ideas i come up with, as well as having players there to test/rate it etc

[/quote]

item.title: What are you after in a server?
item.dc:creator: @inTouch inTouch
item.description:
@inTouch wrote:

  • Every time you die, you should lose 5% of your total experience.
  • Do NOT add custom weapons/armor.
  • Add maybe gambling NPCs? For more fun and diversified gameplay.
  • Add Mage Arena minigame.
  • Add party room(open a chest, enter things from inventory, pull lever and then items are randomly dropped in a room, good for dropping partys).

Good luck, xEnt. I believe this will be something juicy that’ll be made by you.

Read full topic
item.source: What are you after in a server?

item.title: What are you after in a server?
item.dc:creator: @Argation Argation
item.description:
@Argation wrote:

should implement a class system where you can perform quests ( no idea what kind of quest yet ) in order to obtain like a very small bonus in a class of your choise.

Like a Paladin would recieve 5% def and 10% lower pray drain
Berseker/Barbarian would 5% att & Str increase
Stuff like that… keep the bonusses very small! so they don’t impact much.

losing XP seems on death seems like a nice idea

Read full topic

item.title: What are you after in a server?
item.dc:creator: @Ecko Ecko
item.description:
@Ecko wrote:

Erj:

How about some new game matches other than the simple pk. Something like the CTF match types RSCA had. You know just something “Out Of The Box” I’m not too sure myself, but I’ll post back when I think of something.

Team/Clan Deathmatch where first team/clan to X amount of kills total wins.

Team/Clan VIPs where each side must protect a certain amount of NPCs and also attempt to kill the other side’s VIPs.

Read full topic
